availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen C. Hutchison (Lawrence County Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky farmer and Justice of the Peace. Virginia native. Married Eliza S. Bussey Hutchison in 1860. Lawrence County Justice of the Peace in 1864.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1316. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 86. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, County, 1860. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 183. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Ninth Congressional District, 1863, p. 175.
